project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python quiz game that asks multiple-choice questions and keeps track of the user's score.

task.name: Design the quiz structure, including questions and answers
Implement the function to ask questions and get user input
Implement score tracking and display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz functionality
Execute tests on the implemented functionalities to ensure correctness
